text: ama alashqya' faqad wusifu bdd sifat almwmnyn, fahum aladhin la yufun bieahd allah b'ifradh subhanah balebadt baed 'an akdwh ealaa anfshm, wahum aladhin yaqtaeun ma 'amarahum allah bwslh min silat al'arham wghyrha, wayufsidun fi al'ard bieamal almeasy, 'uwlayik almwswfwn bhdhh alsfat alqbyht lahum altrd min rahmat allh, walahum maa ysw'hm min aleadhab alshadid fi aldaar alakhrt
